name: Name
password-reminder-popup: Please contact IT support by phone:
first-paragraph: It's a two part program, which consists of an internship, that's compactible with studies, and a paid internship. This program is fit not only for information technology or similar studies' students but also for anyone who sees themselves working in the IT sector and want to improve their technical skills.
second-paragraph: During this program the participants will be learning programming, data analysis, information system's maintenance and testing, working in a team while using the bank's specific technologies, processes and practices, working with data.
third-paragraph: Students of the IT Academy have the opportunity to test and discover themselves in different areas of IT and at the end of the internship choose the desired field. Trainees work with IT professionals to implement real-world IT projects in selected roles.
join-seeking: Seeking an IT-related education or trying to discover yourself in the field.
join-future: In the future you wish to be a multi-functional IT specialist, who is capable of more than coding.
join-enjoy: Have a burning desire to improve, show initiative and already have basic skills - you enjoy coding, creating web applications or helping your friends solve technical problems.
join-shift: Able to devote time for theoretical and practical assignments. The internship will take place every workday 2 PM - 6 PM.
program: How long does the program last?
program-stages: The program proceeds in two parts:
program-stages-unpaid: First there's an internship for 3 months. The students that perform best during it are then offered a paid internship.
program-stages-paid: Then there's the paid internship for 2 months. The participants that perform best are then offered a job at "Comapny_name" IT.
program-scholarship: During the paid internship the participants are being paid an IT scholarship.
why-competence: You will take part in developing projects, raise your competence and learn the principles of Agile methodology.
why-bank: You will see a bank without a tie where we work and celebrate together.
why-alumni: You'll meet the alumni of "IT Academy@Company_name", who are already working for us.
why-workers: You'll learn not from books, but from "Company_name" IT professionals.
why-improve: You'll be getting quality feedback, which will help you improve even faster.
why-fields: You'll get the opportunity to test and discover yourself in different IT sectors.
why-career: If you perform well and you'll want to continue building your career at "Company_name" IT, at the end of the first internship you'll get a chance to choose where do you want to attend the paid internship.
questions: If you have any questions - message us at atranka@Įmonės_pavadinimas.lt
form-information: Fill the registration form to participate in the IT Academy. The registration form is open until the 30th of November. You'll get the answer about your approval before the 15th of January. If you have any questions feel free to reach out at registration@Company_name.com
error-symbols: Please don't use numbers or spacial symbols
tooltip-hint: Do you have information that a tripartite agreement between you, the company and a third party - education institution or employment services, is possible?
consent: I agree, that my personal information will be used and stored by the IT Academy team.
